DOC.brief_summary: Photozig Stanford University create new program Hispanic dementia caregiver help cope caregiving , alleviate related stress , enhance quality life caregiver , fund National Institute Aging . The program include new education online telenovela ( Webnovela ) , online resource , handout DVD ( user without Internet ) deal caregiving stress handle difficult situation .
DOC.detailed_description: The goal Webnovela program evaluate develop material help caregiver cope caregiving , alleviate related distress , improve quality life . The investigator evaluate different material , may provide caregiving strategy , practical tip help enhance caregiver ' skill deal demand task caregiving , alleviate related stress , improve quality life . Research Program Steps : 1 . Caregivers ask simple question family member see eligible project ( fill Enrollment Form Informed Consent ) . 2 . A Program survey send , complete online , return pre-mailed envelope . 3 . Participants receive link online resource , related material instruction . The investigator ask participant access online resource , read provide brochure guide , follow instruction . Materials expect help participant caregiver role . 4 . After complete program , second final survey fill online return pre-mailed envelope .
DOC.criteria: Care individual Alzheimer 's Disease dementia . Have Internet access DVD player . Minimum age 18 year old . Belong Hispanic/Latino ethnic group . Spend least 8 hours/week care person dementia , may include assist , watch , monitoring , available help ( e.g . sleep time ) Severe psychological physical illness . Inability read follow Spanish instruction . High level depressive symptom . Unwillingness participate aspect study .
